3af365f9-b0a3-49fc-861c-166d9a38056d.description: Earners of this Qlik product qualification have demonstrated fundamental-level and applied knowledge with the Qlik Sense product in the role of Business Analyst. This is not our expert-level certification.
3af365f9-b0a3-49fc-861c-166d9a38056d.name: Qlik Sense Business Analyst Qualification 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Individuals who have earned this badge have demonstrated basic skills in and applied knowledge of Qlik Sense.

These skills include building Qlik Sense visualizations for data analysis, creating master items for business user consumption, incorporating new data from text and Excel files, and understanding how to use and build bookmarks, snapshots and stories for collaboration.

They have demonstrated these skills by completing a two part qualification exam. Part one required building a Qlik Sense app based on a set of data files, starter app, business requirements and activities. Part two required taking the exam itself. The exam tested their abilities: recall capabilities, critical thinking and reasoning, and applied knowledge based on the Qlik Sense app they built.
A passing score on the Qlik Sense Business Analyst qualification exam.

25fd1d84-b51c-464f-8f48-83e2c4ac7022.description: Individuals who have earned this badge have demonstrated a proficiency with data literacy skills. These skills include: interpreting business requirements; understanding and transforming data; designing, building, and interpreting visualizations; and analyzing, acting on, and sharing results. They have demonstrated these skills by passing a 70 question, multiple-choice certification exam.
25fd1d84-b51c-464f-8f48-83e2c4ac7022.name: Qlik Data Literacy Certification

badge_template_activities.title: The Data Literacy Certification Exam is a product-agnostic exam which measures your ability to interpret business requirements; understand and transform data; design, build, and interpret visualizations; and analyze, act on, and share results.
A passing score on the Data Literacy certification exam.

c3e4bf9b-22f2-4313-8432-93ee6098fbf7.description: Earners of this Qlik Product Certification have demonstrated expertise with Qlik Sense Enterprise on Windows in the role of Data Architect. They can identify requirements, design and build effective data models, troubleshoot data models and issues, and validate the data using the Qlik Sense product.
c3e4bf9b-22f2-4313-8432-93ee6098fbf7.name: Qlik Sense Data Architect Certification- February 2021 release

badge_template_activities.title: Ability to identify Qlik Sense features to meet customer needs given a specific business scenario (e.g., associative data model, master items, On Demand App Generation (ODAG), GeoAnalytics)
Expertise in the selection of an appropriate data model that prioritizes reuse, scalability, and efficiency (e.g., tiered architecture, data governance)
Successful demonstration of data model creation using various techniques (e.g., join, keep, resident load, where clause, incremental load, purge strategy, variable)
Proficiency in validating a data model against source information using Qlik Sense visualizations
Ability to resolve data modeling issues (e.g., synthetic keys, circular references, scripting errors, debugging)
Passing score on the Qlik Sense Data Architect certification exam

skills.name: Troubleshooting Data Model and Data Issues

d34c2162-7c44-43db-83bc-f6257251e49a.description: Earners of this Qlik Product Certification have demonstrated expertise with QlikView in the role of Business Analyst. They can gather and interpret requirements, identify and analyze data sources, and design the QlikView application user interface.
d34c2162-7c44-43db-83bc-f6257251e49a.name: QlikView 12 Business Analyst Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Ability to determine KPIs, dimensions, or measures given a set of business objectives
Successful development of production-quality applications in the QlikView platform that are appropriate for the business case presented
Ability to determine the appropriate object and chart type to meet business requirements
Expertise in identifying the relationships among data
Successfully determine the result of a given function or complex expression and identify where alternate uses of expressions are appropriate
Passing score on the QlikView 12 Business Analyst certification exam

7a99b135-4ba3-4664-a385-44220e2b8d22.description: Earners of this Qlik Product Certification have demonstrated expertise with Qlik Sense Enterprise on Windows in the role of Business Analyst. They can identify requirements, design applications, prepare and load data, and develop applications for the Qlik Sense product.
7a99b135-4ba3-4664-a385-44220e2b8d22.name: Qlik Sense Business Analyst Certification- February 2021 release

badge_template_activities.title: Ability to translate business needs into technical requirements and demonstrate the knowledge to determine which Qlik products are needed to meet these requirements
Expertise in determining which Qlik Sense visualizations meet business requirements taking into account flexibility, ease of use, and maintenance
Proficiency in creating an associative data model and troubleshooting basic issues
Expertise in configuring Qlik Sense dashboards to illustrate business insights
Successful development of production-quality applications in the Qlik Sense platform that are appropriate for the business case presented
Passing score on the Qlik Sense Business Analyst certification exam

c706f8cd-62db-4e7e-b917-ae83e3a7fec2.description: Earners of this Qlik Product Certification have demonstrated expertise with QlikView in the role of Data Architect. They have advanced knowledge of the technical aspects of QlikView application development, including design, data modeling and scripting.
c706f8cd-62db-4e7e-b917-ae83e3a7fec2.name: QlikView 12 Data Architect Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Expertise in evaluating business objectives and determining KPIs, dimensions, or measures
Ability to evaluate a dataset and successfully determine how the data characteristics at the field level will affect the QlikView data model (e.g., performance, accuracy)
Expertise in creation and optimization of the QlikView Associative Data Model
Proficiency in the design and development of the QlikView Application User Interface, including implementing appropriate objects or chart types
Expertise in the delivery of the QlikView application and the ability to provide direction for both users and developers
Expertise in tuning and troubleshooting the data model
Passing score on the QlikView 12 Data Architect certification exam

1ca2b74b-ba3d-4ceb-8cf9-a4f89178e8d1.description: Individuals who have earned this badge have demonstrated data analytic skills. These skills include Data Foundations, Foundational Analytics, Interpretation of Analytics, and Advanced Analytics. They have demonstrated these skills by completing a 70 question certification exam.
1ca2b74b-ba3d-4ceb-8cf9-a4f89178e8d1.name: Qlik Data Analytics Certification

badge_template_activities.title: The Data Analytics Certification Exam measures your analytic and statistics knowledge, from a basic to advanced level.
The exam is product-agnostic and covers four categories of analytics: Data Foundations, Foundational Analytics, Interpretation of Analytics, and Advanced Analytics.
A passing score on the Data Analytics certification exam.

7879f697-453b-4467-bd83-f42693e0343c.description: Earners of this Qlik product qualification have demonstrated fundamental-level and applied knowledge with the Qlik Sense product in the role of Data Architect. This is not our expert-level certification.
7879f697-453b-4467-bd83-f42693e0343c.name: Qlik Sense Data Architect Qualification 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Individuals who have earned this badge have demonstrated basic skills in and applied knowledge of Qlik Sense.

These skills include understanding data modeling concepts, generating, debugging and troubleshooting the load script, incorporating new data using external files and data sources, and creating master items for business user consumption.

They have demonstrated these skills by completing a two part qualification exam. Part one required building a Qlik Sense app based on a set of data files, starter app, business requirements and activities. Part two required taking the exam itself. The exam tested their abilities: recall capabilities, critical thinking and reasoning, and applied knowledge based on the Qlik Sense app they built.
A passing score on the Qlik Sense Data Architect qualification exam.

9d45d4fc-554f-419d-bcf6-83773ada929e.description: Earners of this Qlik Product Certification have demonstrated expertise with Qlik Sense Enterprise on Windows in the role of System Administrator. They can identify requirements for environments, install and administer Qlik Sense Enterprise, and tune and scale environments.
9d45d4fc-554f-419d-bcf6-83773ada929e.name: Qlik Sense System Administrator Certification- February 2021 release

badge_template_activities.title: Successful evaluation of environment options for a Qlik Sense deployment and recommendation of the correct authentication and authorization method based on requirements
Expertise in configuring the initial environment for Qlik Sense access including multi-node deployment, proxies, and virtual proxies
Ability to configure tasks based on business and system needs
Proficiency in the management of streams and apps as well as privileges in the Qlik Sense deployment
Expertise in monitoring system performance and the ability to troubleshoot Qlik Sense errors and issues
Passing score on the Qlik Sense System Administrator certification exam

60a94040-35b4-4e35-8404-b1351800937f.description: Earners of this Qlik Product Certification have demonstrated expertise with Qlik Sense in the role of Data Architect. Expertise in proactive management of QlikView platform infrastructure
Proficiency in configuring and monitoring document tasks
Expertise in resource allocation, troubleshooting, and resolution of performance issues

f233942b-01c6-4d36-9483-0ed8bed77715.description: Earners of this Specialization will be able to utilize successful selling strategies having in-depth understanding of value, positioning, and capabilities. Pre-Sales or Post-Sales positions appropriate for this role.

Expertise in monitoring system performance and the ability to investigate Qlik Sense errors and issues
Passing score on the Qlik Replicate certification exam

d578d53e-a5fe-437e-abab-51cfb2e813f5.description: Earners of this badge are industry leaders from across the Qlik Partner Ecosystem who support Qlik in driving exceptional customer outcomes. Partner Ambassadors are widely recognized as Qlik experts in their field and serve as public advocates for Qlik in the market.
d578d53e-a5fe-437e-abab-51cfb2e813f5.name: Qlik Partner Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Earners must be active and consistently helpful on Qlik Community, data-focused forums, social media, industry social networks, and company or personal blogs. They must be visible in the Qlik ecosystem as a Qlik Meetup Captain, Community MVP or speaker at Qlik events.
Earners must be regularly willing to share best practices and knowledge at industry events, forums, in the press, and with industry analysts.
Earners must be committed to providing feedback that is constructive and actionable.

50083cf9-6872-4788-8a40-c70367b780e5.description: Individuals who have earned this badge have completed the instructor-led course, Applied Data Analytics using Qlik Sense. This course combines data literacy and analytics concepts with Qlik Sense capabilities. Students apply what they learn each week to real-work business problems with live data to make data-informed decisions.
50083cf9-6872-4788-8a40-c70367b780e5.name: Applied Data Analytics using Qlik Sense

badge_template_activities.title: This intensive 15-week, blended learning course focuses on data analytics and data literacy, and the effective use in a Qlik Sense application.
Skills learned include the fundamentals of building Qlik Sense apps, visualizations and design best practices.

c853d2b8-d57d-4bc4-bdb1-2f37cf403cca.description: Earners of this Qlik Product Certification have demonstrated expertise in the design, implementation, and support of automated data warehouse and data lake solutions within the Qlik Data Integration Compose platform.
c853d2b8-d57d-4bc4-bdb1-2f37cf403cca.name: Qlik Compose Certification-February 2021 release

badge_template_activities.title: Expertise in Qlik Compose data architecture components including data lake view options, supported data storage and processing combinations, and Qlik Replicate integration
Success in building a logical warehouse model, defining data lake entities, and designing data marts
Advanced understanding of data lake mappings, storage tasks and how to implement data transformations
Ability to define workflows and scheduling, manage source control and deployment packages, and monitor operations
Passing score on the Qlik Compose certification exam

744df086-2c61-4613-8242-94ca1dad13f6.description: Earners of this Qlik Product Endorsement have demonstrated expertise in the SaaS specific capabilities of Qlik Sense needed in the role of business analyst. They can differentiate the features and navigation of the Qlik Sense Cloud hub, create and share apps, add and manage data, and collaborate with other Qlik Sense Cloud users.
744df086-2c61-4613-8242-94ca1dad13f6.name: Qlik Sense SaaS Business Analyst Endorsement- 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Demonstrated expertise in publishing, sharing, and duplicating apps in the Qlik Sense SaaS environment.
Ability to add/connect data to the Qlik cloud tenant and analyze via Data manager.
Knowlege of how to share app content, including sharing of Notes, Charts, On-demand apps, and subscriptions.
Successful completion of the required pre-requisite certification: Qlik Sense Business Analyst- 2022
Passing score on the Qlik Sense SaaS Business Analyst Endorsement exam

9b231f49-386e-41a4-b599-c066c6727fac.description: The earner of this badge received honorable mention recognition in the Qlik Global Partner Active Intelligence Demo Challenge. 9b231f49-386e-41a4-b599-c066c6727fac.name: Demo Challenge 2022 Honorable Mention

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge received honorable mention recognition in the Qlik Global Partner Active Intelligence Demo Challenge. Through an original demo, the earner demonstrated how Qlik’s value proposition and end-to-end capabilities meet customer needs.

425cb542-e7a7-44ff-adce-257640e87914.description: Qlik Educator Ambassadors are an exclusive group of our most active Qlik Academic Program educator members. These are individuals who fully utilize and champion our Academic Program resources to make more students data literate and to prepare them for the data-driven workplace.
425cb542-e7a7-44ff-adce-257640e87914.name: 2023 Academic Program Educator Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Passionate about the Qlik Academic Program and the resources provided to students and educators
An active promoter of the Qlik Academic Program to academic peers as well as students
A contributor to blogs, forums, university publications, professional journals, papers, or other materials that promote the Qlik Academic Program

8524d0be-3a01-468c-88dc-ca3326a79786.description: Individuals who have earned this badge have completed the instructor-led course, Create Visualizations with Qlik Sense. This scenario-based course, addresses the fundamentals required to enable you for self-service visualization and discovery.
8524d0be-3a01-468c-88dc-ca3326a79786.name: Create Visualizations with Qlik Sense

badge_template_activities.title: The course combines demonstrations and hands-on exercises to teach the essential concepts for designing beautiful and effective Qlik Sense visualizations and guided stories.
You will look in depth at the different visualizations and select the appropriate one for your data and the type of questions you need to answer.

f8d90e9e-0286-47b2-9460-a52a682d18d1.description: Earners of this Qlik Product Endorsement have demonstrated expertise in the SaaS specific capabilities of Qlik Sense needed in the role of data architect. They have demonstrated expertise in data modeling, loading data, and creating data connections in Qlik Sense SaaS edition.
f8d90e9e-0286-47b2-9460-a52a682d18d1.name: Qlik Sense SaaS Data Architect Endorsement- 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Ability to differentiate the features and navigation of the Qlik Cloud (e.g., navigation menus, Insight Advisor, home, collections, profile settings, catalogue)
Apply the steps to add/connect data to the Qlik cloud tenant (both new and existing).
Collaborate with Qlik Cloud users including the management of shared data sets and connections.
Successful completion of the required pre-requisite certification: Qlik Sense Data Architect- 2022
Passing score on the Qlik Sense SaaS Data Architect Endorsement exam

35d7ec14-ad1e-4532-bd8e-aafdfad1c282.description: Individuals who have earned this badge have completed the instructor-led course, Data Modeling for Qlik Sense. This is a technical course to learn to develop a coherent data model in Qlik Sense by loading and transforming multiple data sources.
35d7ec14-ad1e-4532-bd8e-aafdfad1c282.name: Data Modeling for Qlik Sense

badge_template_activities.title: With information, tools, techniques, and exercises, this course includes topics dealing with: maintaining data connections, transforming source data, architecting data models, optimizing for performance, and application development on Qlik Sense Enterprise.

Skills Learned: Create a data model in Qlik Sense; Use the Data Load Editor and the Data Manager; Create and maintain data connections; Resolve data structure issues and script errors; Transform data for better performance; Discuss synthetic keys and circular references; Add dimensions and measures to the master library; Add simple visualizations with Qlik Sense.

f16f6c4d-0987-4ba0-9add-a1b27682aa15.description: Earners of this Qlik Product Endorsement have demonstrated expertise in the planning, implementation, and management of a Qlik Sense SaaS environment. f16f6c4d-0987-4ba0-9add-a1b27682aa15.name: Qlik Sense SaaS Administrator Endorsement- 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Management of the Qlik Cloud tenant including appropriate data security and governance
Manage inbound and outbound traffic
Configure and monitor security capabilities including API keys and multi-factor authentication.
Passing score on the Qlik Sense SaaS Administrator Endorsement exam
Successful completion of the required pre-requisite certification: Qlik Sense Business Analyst- 2022

Partner will receive this badge once they have at least 2 employees who have successfully passed all three (3) assessments in the Cloud Analytics Specialization; including Sales, Solution and Implementation and they've submitted a complete Case Study to the Global Partner Team.

fc69591b-7083-41db-b3e9-9fe7b386b0e6.description: Partner Organization Badge - This is an organizational level badge which will only be achieved once an organization has 2 partner employees who have successfully passed all three (3) assessments in the Data Integration Specialization; including Sales, Solution and Implementation and they've submitted a complete Case Study to the Global Partner Team. The partners need to complete the 2 Sales Assessments, 1 Solution Assessment and 1 Implementation Assessment.
fc69591b-7083-41db-b3e9-9fe7b386b0e6.name: Qlik Partner Data Integration Specialization

badge_template_activities.title: This is an organizational level badge which will only be achieved once an organization has 2 partner employees who have successfully passed all three (3) assessments in the Data Integration Specialization; including Sales, Solution and Implementation and they've submitted a complete Case Study to the Global Partner Team. The partners need to complete the 2 Sales Assessments, 1 Solution Assessment and 1 Implementation Assessment.

ebcf0ce2-ede8-4d79-badb-636066b350c5.description: Individuals who have earned this badge have completed the instructor-led course, Synchronizing Data with Qlik Replicate. This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the Qlik Replicate product, implementation considerations as well as ongoing operational know-how. This includes an overview of the product GUI, prerequisites for installation, configuring tasks, applying transformations, setting up notifications, using APIs, and monitoring the environment.
ebcf0ce2-ede8-4d79-badb-636066b350c5.name: Synchronizing Data with Qlik Replicate

badge_template_activities.title: Qlik Replicate will provide a comprehensive introduction to the Qlik Replicate product, implementation considerations as well as ongoing operational know-how. This includes an overview of the product GUI, prerequisites for installation, configuring tasks, applying transformations, setting up notifications, using APIs, and monitoring the environment.

0db39010-2c8a-4c95-98c3-730067303aba.description: Individuals who have earned this badge have completed the instructor-led course, Administer Qlik Sense SaaS. This technical course gives you the information, tools, techniques, and skills necessary to deploy, set up, configure, and maintain a Qlik Sense Enterprise environment hosted by Qlik Cloud Services.
0db39010-2c8a-4c95-98c3-730067303aba.name: Administer Qlik Sense SaaS

badge_template_activities.title: Explore single sign-on using an identity provider to maintain and manage identity information for principals while providing authentication services.
Explore the automated data transfer process from on-premise to Qlik Sense SaaS.
Collaborate with business users using shared or managed spaces utilizing Qlik Sense’s enterprise class governance capabilities for ensuring quality, accuracy, and security of data and analytics.

58ecad91-0a6b-4030-ab11-b6265c7def0a.description: Individuals who have earned this badge have completed the instructor-led course, Provisioning Data with Qlik Compose. This course provides an introduction to the Qlik Compose product and its capabilities.
58ecad91-0a6b-4030-ab11-b6265c7def0a.name: Provisioning Data with Qlik Compose

badge_template_activities.title: This includes installation prerequisites, connection and authorization setup, reviewing the data model, defining mappings and any transformation needed.
Also includes operational topics such as scheduling and monitoring.

ec46fc07-ec9e-4791-a527-07dfd06b5be2.description: Partner Organizational Badge - Partner will receive this specialization badge once they have at least 2 employees who have successfully passed all three (3) assessments in the Auto ML Specialization; including Sales, Solution and Implementation and they've submitted a complete Case Study to the Global Partner Team.
ec46fc07-ec9e-4791-a527-07dfd06b5be2.name: Qlik Partner AutoML Specialization

badge_template_activities.title: Partner will receive this badge once they have at least 2 employees who have successfully passed all three (3) assessments in the Auto ML Specialization; including Sales, Solution and Implementation and they've submitted a complete Case Study to the Global Partner Team.
